document_data.caption: Alda, cleaning a table.
document_data.name: Alda Adze
document_data.mainbody: da had dark brown hair and wore a simple white and gray dress while working.
document_data.Description: Alda had dark brown hair and wore a simple white and gray dress while working.
document_data.History: Alda joined her husband [[Trosken Adze]] in operating the Ball and Chain after the opening of the prison, which served as the Wheloon dock's sole spot of relaxation. She was not pleased with the name.
